name: 2017 The 4th International Conference on Education and Social Sciences (2017 ICEASS)
content: Date(s) of conference: February 21-23, 2017 Location: Singapore Key dates (registration, abstract submission etc): Abstract/Paper Submission Deadline November 10, 2016 Notification of Acceptance November 25, 2016 Final Abstract/ Full Paper Submission Deadline December 15, 2016 Registration Deadline December 15, 2016 Conference Date February 21-23, 2017 Conference Website link: http://iceass.org Contact details: iceass@iceass.org Organized by Higher Education Forum (HEF) , International Conference on Education and Social Sciences (ICEASS) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of accounting, banking, finance, economics, management, business, political science, sociology and beyond. 2017 ICEASS will take place from February 21-23, 2017 in Singapore. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals. For more information, please visit: http://iceass.org or contact: iceass@iceass.org Organized by Higher Education Forum
